scenes.description: MC section where members introduce themselves and the group FLOW GLOW.
Performance of the song 'MAKE IT, BREAK IT'.

subtitles.original: 夢を越えろ Hey
subtitles.english: Surpass your dreams, hey

subtitles.original: Woah woah woah ここまで来いよ
subtitles.english: Woah woah woah, come over here

subtitles.original: 腹も冷えつくリスクがたまんない
subtitles.english: The risk that chills my core is irresistible

subtitles.original: 安手な安心を手伝うにはなんない
subtitles.english: Cheap security won't do a thing to help

subtitles.original: 次に来る予定も好きにやんな
subtitles.english: Do whatever you want with your next plans

subtitles.original: 離さないよ baby
subtitles.english: I won't let go, baby

subtitles.original: もうちょい遊んで頂戴
subtitles.english: Play with me a little more

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にしてるってとんでもない
subtitles.english: No way I'm making fun of you

subtitles.original: 俺バイキング食べ放題
subtitles.english: I'm an all-you-can-eat buffet

subtitles.original: ただ毒にあたってもドンマイ お味のほどはいかがですか
subtitles.english: But don't mind if you get poisoned, how does it taste?

subtitles.english: Surpass your dreams

subtitles.english: Look up from there

subtitles.english: Really, go higher and higher

subtitles.english: Hey woah woah, come over here

subtitles.english: Come together, Come together, yeah

subtitles.english: Can't wait, won't wait, no matter how much, it's not enough

subtitles.original: 腹一杯 食べたい てめえを焼くサラライ
subtitles.english: Wanna eat my fill, roasting you, Sarracenia

subtitles.original: 赤子の五分五分の胎胞 掘り出し物は手に入れるのが勝負
subtitles.english: The fifty-fifty embryo of a baby, it's a battle to get the bargains

subtitles.original: 足元もくもくスモーク 超高級なフルコース
subtitles.english: Smoke billowing at your feet, a super high-end full course

subtitles.original: 数字等には通ず ウォッチコック上手
subtitles.english: Proficient in numbers and such, a skilled watch-cook

subtitles.original: もっと食らおうショートポーズ ノンストップな時でゴート ダ トップ オブ ザ トップ
subtitles.english: Let's eat more, short pause, goat in non-stop time, to the top of the top

subtitles.original: 夢を越えろ Hey
subtitles.english: Surpass your dreams, hey

subtitles.original: Woah woah woah ここまで来いよ
subtitles.english: Woah woah woah, come over here

subtitles.original: あれが世界なんて
subtitles.english: So that's what the world is

subtitles.original: 誰の誰の果て
subtitles.english: Whose end is it?

subtitles.original: 恒の星何もいこって
subtitles.english: Even the eternal stars are nothing

subtitles.original: これだけ悩んだってしょうがないか
subtitles.english: I guess there's no use worrying this much

subtitles.original: あれは夢だったって思うことにしたって
subtitles.english: Even if I decide to think it was all a dream

subtitles.original: でも全然燃えないけど助けてよブラザー
subtitles.english: I'm not fired up at all, but save me, brother

subtitles.original: あらがうだけ若さに負け
subtitles.english: Just struggling, losing to youth

subtitles.original: Next next lucky lucky lucky
subtitles.english: Next, next, lucky, lucky, lucky

subtitles.original: あれを割り切れたらさ
subtitles.english: If only I could just accept it

subtitles.original: あれを楽なろにとか
subtitles.english: Thinking it would be easier

subtitles.original: マジ新世界か
subtitles.english: Is it really a new world?

subtitles.original: アンタ以外は
subtitles.english: Except for you

subtitles.original: アンタ以外はいらないないない
subtitles.english: I don't need anyone but you

subtitles.original: アンタならば Happy chappy yeah
subtitles.english: If it's you, then Happy chappy yeah

subtitles.original: アンタのその手と 私のこの手
subtitles.english: Your hand and my hand

subtitles.original: 繋いだらもう二度と離さないわ
subtitles.english: Once joined, I'll never let go

subtitles.original: アンタのその手と 私のこの手
subtitles.english: Your hand and my hand

subtitles.original: 掴んだら過去を蒸し返す
subtitles.english: If I grab them, I'll bring up the past

subtitles.original: Oh my love
subtitles.english: Oh my love

subtitles.original: ニコたんが来たー！
subtitles.english: Nico-tan is here!

subtitles.original: エンジン全開、レッツゴー！ 盛り上がっていくぞ、レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: Engine at full throttle, let's go! Let's get pumped up, let's go!

subtitles.original: FLOW GLOWの充電足りてる？足りてないよな！ 後半戦も盛り上がっていくぞ！
subtitles.english: Are your FLOW GLOW batteries charged? I bet they're not! Let's keep the energy up for the second half!

subtitles.original: みんなのこと、もっとメラメラにしちゃうぞ！ 後半戦も、せーの、うー、ビビ！
subtitles.english: I'm gonna make you all even more fired up! For the second half, here we go... woo, BiBi!

subtitles.original: みんなに会えて、とっても幸せです！ 画面の向こうのみんな、声出せ、オラー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to meet you all! Everyone watching on screen, let's hear your voices, come on!

subtitles.original: 新しい姿のFLOW GLOWで、新しい曲、聴いてくれ。 MAKE IT, BREAK IT.
subtitles.english: With FLOW GLOW's new look, listen to our new song. MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: Make it Break it, Make it Break it, Make it Break it, lock on
subtitles.english: Make it Break it, Make it Break it, Make it Break it, lock on

subtitles.original: マトメが合えば相棒、君こそが相棒
subtitles.english: If our eyes meet, we're partners, you're the one

subtitles.original: メロつかせる才能 Make it break it, Make it break it
subtitles.english: Talent for making them fall, Make it break it, Make it break it

subtitles.original: パッと見しててもデモ、中にはサムデモ
subtitles.english: Even if you just glance, some demo inside

subtitles.original: そのギャップ大凶、あれは最高、ヘイトはシコト Hey so
subtitles.english: That gap is a total disaster, it's the best, hate is a joke, hey so

subtitles.original: 一蓮托生 tonight、退屈に用はない
subtitles.english: Being in the same boat tonight, no time for boredom

subtitles.original: 一戦隠せばじゃない、たらさないしょうがない
subtitles.english: It's not about hiding a battle, can't stop, it can't be helped

subtitles.original: 内らが連れ出す Party Party Party
subtitles.english: We'll take you out, Party Party Party
